original_text: But in the seventh year Jehoiada sent and brought the captains of the Carites and of the guards, and had them come to him in the house of the Lord. And he made a covenant with them and put them under oath in the house of the Lord, and he showed them the king's son.
korean_text: 일곱째 해에 여호야다가 사람을 보내 가리 사람의 백부장들과 호위병의 백부장들을 불러 데리고 여호와의 성전으로 들어가서 그들과 언약을 맺고 그들에게 여호와의 성전에서 맹세하게 한 후에 왕자를 그들에게 보이고

sentences.original_text: and brought the captains of the Carites and of the guards
and had them come to him
in the house of the Lord.
And he made a covenant with them
in the house of the Lord,
and he showed them the king's son.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 왕의 아들을 그들에게 보여주었습니다
